PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.starter.cmd.java_opts
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: These are the java options passed in before the main class

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.enabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The enabled flag allows for disabling the VM from starting without have to remove it from deployment.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.timetolive
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Time-to-live (in milliseconds) for threads used to do work on client requests.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.starter.maxHeapSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum heap size, in megabytes, to be used for this VM. If no value is provided for this property, the default property value from the configuration is used; if no value is specified anywhere, no maximum heap size will be set.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.minPort
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Min port number

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.maxThreads
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Maximum socket listener threads.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.bind.address
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The bind address, when specified determines what address the vm will be bound to.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.starter.minHeapSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The minimum heap size, in megabytes, to be used for this VM. If no value is provided for this property, the default property value from the configuration is used; if no value is specified anywhere, no minimum heap size will be set.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.inputBufferSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The size of socket buffer used when reading.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.socketPort
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The port number for the process when socket communications are being used

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.forced.shutdown.time
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The the number of seconds the VM will wait until it will perform a force shutdown.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.outputBufferSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The size of the socket buffer used when writing.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: usersFile
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Location of the properties file containing user name and password entries.

PropertyDefinition.Name: groupsFile
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Location of the properties file containing group assignments.

PropertyDefinition.Name: checkPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Check passwords against the users file.

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxCodeTables
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max Number of Code Tables

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxCodeTableRecords
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max Number of Records Per Code Table

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxPlanCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Maximum number of plans in the cache

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: IntervalToCheckServiceState
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: This property controls the interval for checking for the ODBC service state (seconds).

PropertyDefinition.Name: ServerKey
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The location the ODBC Server license should be found

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: Openrdaloc
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The location the MMODBC.ini should be found

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnMaxRows
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if an Exception should be thrown if the specified value for Maximum Result Rows is exceeded; else no exception and no more than the maximum will be returned

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: SourceConnectionTestInterval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: How often (in seconds) to create test connections to the underlying datasource to see if it is available.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnMaxRows
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if an Exception should be thrown if the specified value for Maximum Result Rows is exceeded; else no exception and no more than the maximum will be returned

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: ServiceMonitoringEnabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Whether to monitor the underlying data source to see if it is available.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Immutable
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: True if the source never changes.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.starter.timetolive
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Process Time-to-live (TTL) for threads used to start services.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.transaction.log.storeMMCMD
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determine whether MetaMatrix command information should be recorded

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.relative.storageDirectory
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The relative path to Host data directory where temporary files are stored.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.extensionTypesToCache
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Types of Extension Modules to Cache
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Types of Extension Module files to cache in memory. Separate by commas. Allowed values: (Configuration Model,Function Definition,JAR File,VDB File)

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.processorBatchSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The size of a batch sent within the query processor.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.fileFormat
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Driver class name for the JDBC auditing destination

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.maxOpenFiles
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum number of open file descriptors used by buffer management temp storage.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.consoleFormat
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Format class for console log messages
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The name of the class that is used to format the log messages sent to the console

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.contexts
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The contexts for audit messages that are NOT to be recorded

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.contexts
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The contexts for log messages that are NOT to be recorded

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.encryption.internal.encryptAll
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Force the encryption of all internal traffic, not just the traffic to secure services.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.jdbcResourceDelim
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Auditing Destination delimiter for resource names
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The delimiter that is used to separate resource names

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.jdbcMaxResourceLength
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Context Destination maximum length for audit text
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum length of the resource name used in audit messages. Required if JDBC audit destination is to be used.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.session.sessionMonitor.ActivityInterval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: How often sessions will be monitored to check for over-limit sessions and invalidate them.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.jdbcTable
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The name of the table that auditing messages are to be written to. Required if JDBC audit destination is to be used

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.size.monitor.mins
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The time interval in minutes the log file size is monitored

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.jdbcMaxContextLength
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Logging Destination maximum length for contexts
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum length of all the disregarded log contexts in total

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.jdbcTable
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The table the logging information to be written to

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.transaction.log.storeSRCCMD
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determine whether source command information should be recorded

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.maxThreads
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum number of auditing threads allowed

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.maxRows
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Logging maximum number of rows returned
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum number of rows returned

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.encryption.secure.sockets
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determines whether the Secure Sockets are enabled, configuration is done from the SSL Resource

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.encryption.internal.authenticationMode
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Sets the internal SSL authentication mode if internal SSL is enabled.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.console
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: True if the audit messages are to be sent to standard out for a VM

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.maxFileSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum size (in megabytes) that a buffer file is allowed to reach before creating spill files.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.commandLoggerClassname
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The fully-qualified classname of the CommandLoggerSPI implementation to be used by Tracking Service.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.jdbcDatabase.enabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: If enabled, then log to the jdbc destination.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.managementInterval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The period between checking whether active memory cleanup should occur.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.encryption.client
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determines whether the client side jce provider encryption will be performed

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The level at which logging will occur

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.encryption.internal.secure.sockets
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Enable the use of SSL of RMI and HostController communication.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.fileAppend
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determines whether or not the audit destination file will be appended or overwritten

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.file
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The name of the file that is the audit message destination. If blank or not provided, audit messages are not sent to a file destination

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.connectorBatchSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The size of a batch sent between connector and query service.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.logStatsInterval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The period between writing buffer management statistics to the log, used primarily for debugging.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.enabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determines whether auditing will be performed

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.authorization.metabase.CheckingEnabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determines whether MetaBase authorization (Entitlements) will be checked

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.authorization.dataaccess.CheckingEnabled
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determines whether authorization (Entitlements) will be checked

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.encryption.jce.provider
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates the jce encryption provider

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.jdbcMaxContextLength
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Auditing Destination maximum length for contexts
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum length of the list of disregarded audit contexts. Required if JDBC audit destination is to be used.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.cacheConnectorClassLoaders
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determine whether to cache ClassLoaders in memory, for connectors that have the same classpath

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.service.essentialservice
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Indicates if the service is essential to operation of the Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.extension.CommonClasspath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Semicolon-delimited list of URLs to define extension classpath. This path will be used to load UDFs, connectors, membershipdomain etc. Extension module URLs are of the form 'extensionjar:jarfilename.jar'

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.serviceMonitorInterval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: How often to ask connectors whether the underlying data source is available. Note that underlying connector implementation may not ping the actual data source every time it is asked, for performance reasons.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.size.limit.kbs
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Maximum log file size at which it will be swapped.

PropertyDefinition.Name: vm.starter.maxThreads
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum number of threads used to start services.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.jdbcMaxLength
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Logging Destination maximum length for log messages
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum length of the text that is logged

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.deployment.platform
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: This property indicates the type of server platform which the Integration Server is running on

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.captureSystemErr
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Capture standard error to the logs
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: True if the standard error is to be captured as log messages

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.jdbcMaxExceptionLength
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: JDBC Logging Destination maximum length for exception text
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum length of the text that is logged as an exception

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.session.time.limit
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max connection time limit as a system property, forcibly terminate any connection that exceeds that limit, default would be no limit.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.procDebug
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Determine whether to dump all data batches to the server log when using OPTION DEBUG

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.sessionUsePercentage
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum percentage of buffer memory that a may be used by a session.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.memoryAvailable
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Amount of memory, in megabytes, to use as buffer management memory in each process.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.threadTTL
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum time (in milliseconds) that a auditing thread is allowed to live

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.consoleFormat
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The name of the class that is used to format the audit messages sent to the console

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.metadata.systemURL
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URL identifies the System VDB

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.session.max.connections
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max Number of Sessions allowed to connect to Integration Server (reject any connection requests beyond that limit, default would be no limit)

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.server.streamingBatchSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The clob, blob and XML streaming batch size in kilobytes

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.captureSystemOut
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Capture standard out to the logs
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: True if the standard out is to be captured as log messages

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.log.console
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Send log messages to standard out
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: True if the log messages are to be sent to standard out for a VM

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.audit.jdbcDatabase
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: If auditing enabled, then record to the jdbc destination.

PropertyDefinition.Name: metamatrix.buffer.activeMemoryThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The percentage of buffer management memory that serves as a threshold for active memory management.

PropertyDefinition.Name: users.displayName.attribute
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The attribute(s) that uniquely identifies a user.

PropertyDefinition.Name: users.searchFilter
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The search filter(s) to apply to each users root context.

PropertyDefinition.Name: users.rootContext
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Specifies the context(s) to use when searching for users.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ldapAdmin.dn
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Bind account DN for group lookup.

PropertyDefinition.Name: users.memberOf.attribute
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Attribute(s) that appears on each user that identifies group membership.

PropertyDefinition.Name: groups.displayName.attribute
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The attribute(s) that uniquely identifies a group.

PropertyDefinition.Name: users.searchScope
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: How far down the directory tree to search each users root context.

PropertyDefinition.Name: groups.rootContext
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Specifies the context(s) to use when searching for groups.

PropertyDefinition.Name: groups.searchFilter
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The search filter(s) to apply to each groups root context.

PropertyDefinition.Name: groups.searchScope
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: How far down the directory tree to search each groups root context.

PropertyDefinition.Name: txnTimeoutInMillis
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Time to wait for LDAP operations to complete.

PropertyDefinition.Name: groups.groupMember.attribute
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The attribute(s) that contains the members of the group.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ldapURL
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Full LDAP URL

PropertyDefinition.Name: ldapAdmin.password
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Bind account password for group lookup.

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthDomainClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Full class name of the Membership Domain.

PropertyDefinition.Name: propertiesFile
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Location of the properties file for this Membership Domain.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: UseBindVariables
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Use prepared statements and bind variables

PropertyDefinition.Name: DatabaseTimeZone
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Time zone of the database, if different than Integration Server

PropertyDefinition.Name: TransactionIsolationLevel
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the data source transaction isolation level

PropertyDefinition.Name: SetCriteriaBatchSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max number of values in an IN Predicate. Must be >= 0.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionSource
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Driver, DataSource, or XADataSource class name

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrimStrings
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Right Trim fixed character types returned as Strings

PropertyDefinition.Name: IsXA
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Is XA

PropertyDefinition.Name: UseCommentsInSourceQuery
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Use informational comments in Source Queries
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: This will embed /*comment*/ style comment with session/request id in source SQL query for informational purposes

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionSource
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Driver, DataSource, or XADataSource class name

PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Driver, DataSource, or XADataSource class name

PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Driver, DataSource, or XADataSource class name

PropertyDefinition.Name: IsXA
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Is XA

PropertyDefinition.Name: SetCriteriaBatchSize
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Max number of values in an IN Predicate. Must be >= 0.

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: SearchDefaultBaseDN
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Default Base DN for LDAP Searches

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.cleaning_interval
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the interval to cleaning the pool

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapAdminUserDN
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: User DN for the LDAP admin account.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapMaxCriteria
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Maximum number of criteria supported in an LDAP search filter.

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapAdminUserPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password of the LDAP admin user account.

PropertyDefinition.Name: SearchDefaultScope
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Default Scope for LDAP Searches

PropertyDefinition.Name: RestrictToObjectClass
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Restrict Searches To Named Object Class
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Restrict Searches to objectClass named in the Name field for a table

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.max_connections
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the maximum number of connections for the connection pool

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapTxnTimeoutInMillis
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Timeout value for LDAP searches. Defaults to TCP timeout value.

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.wait_for_source_time
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the time to wait if the connection is not available

PropertyDefinition.Name: LdapUrl
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Ldap URL of the server, including port number.

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.live_and_unused_time
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set the idle time of the connection before it should be closed if pool shrinking is enabled

PropertyDefinition.Name: com.metamatrix.data.pool.enable_shrinking
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Set whether to enable the pool shrinking

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: username
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for Salesforce authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: InLimit
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The maximum number of values that can be supplied in an IN criteria

PropertyDefinition.Name: password
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for Salesforce authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: URL
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: URL for connecting to Salesforce

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: EnforceColumnCount
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: This forces the number of columns in text file to match what was modeled

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorTypeClassPath
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connector Type classpath (defined by system, do not modify)

PropertyDefinition.Name: CharacterEncodingScheme
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: A character-encoding scheme is a mapping between a coded character set and a set of octet (eight-bit byte) sequences. Some samples are UTF-8,ISO-8859-1,UTF-16)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connection type used to get the XML data

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: SAMLPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: SAML Property File (only required when SAML profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: SAML Security property file (saml.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: wsdl
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: URL to Web Service Definition File

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthUserName
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: WSSecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of WS-Security to be used; Combinations of multiple security types can be used with a space in-between. Allowed types are: (UsernameToken, UsernameToken-Digest, SAMLTokenUnsigned, SAMLTokenSigned, Signature, Timestamp, Encrypt)

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptUserName
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt UserName (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The username to be used in the encryption; if blank uses auth username

PropertyDefinition.Name: EndPoint
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: An alternate service endpoint other than one specified in WSDL, to execute the service

PropertyDefinition.Name: SecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of Authentication to used with the web service; If WS-Secuirty is being used, then WS-Secuirty type must be defined

PropertyDefinition.Name: CryptoPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: User Crypto Property File (If SAML or Signature profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography;defines the certificates;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectionType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Connection type used to get the XML data

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt crypto property file (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography for encryption of the message;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Only required for Signature and Signed SAML; The issuer-serial method presumes that all trusted users of the service are known to the service and have pre-registered their certificate chains before using the service. The direct-reference method presumes that the service operator trusts all users with certificates issued by a trusted CA.

PropertyDefinition.Name: TextExtractionThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: extract text sections larger than this size to a file where more efficient access as a CLOB can be effected.

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: SaxFilterProviderClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class the provides extended XML Filters

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxFileCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of file cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: LogRequestResponseDocs
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Log XML Request and Response Documents
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Write the request and response documents to the log at Info level

PropertyDefinition.Name: InputStreamFilterClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess raw XML input stream

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxMemoryCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of in-memory cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: QueryPreprocessorClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess the IQuery

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: TextExtractionThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Extract text sections larger than this size to a file where more efficient access as a CLOB can be effected.

PropertyDefinition.Name: SaxFilterProviderClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class the provides extended XML Filters

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxFileCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of file cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: HttpBasicAuthPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for HTTP basic authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: ProxyUri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the proxy server

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnIntraQueryCacheExpiration
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Throw an exception when a document expires from the cache between executing different parts of a single query (instead of requesting the document again)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: HttpBasicAuthUserName
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for HTTP basic authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: Uri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the HTTP source

PropertyDefinition.Name: UseHttpBasic
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Use basic HTTP Authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: LogRequestResponseDocs
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Log XML Request and Response Documents
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Write the request and response documents to the log at Info level

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustDeserializerClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to process trusted payloads and execution payloads

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxMemoryCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of in-memory cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: InputStreamFilterClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess raw XML input stream

PropertyDefinition.Name: HostnameVerifier
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Class implementing javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier. Used to implement a hostname mismatch workaround.

PropertyDefinition.Name: QueryPreprocessorClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess the IQuery

PropertyDefinition.Name: TextExtractionThreshold
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Extract text sections larger than this size to a file where more efficient access as a CLOB can be effected.

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthPassword
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Password value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: SaxFilterProviderClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class the provides extended XML Filters

PropertyDefinition.Name: AuthUserName
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Name value for authentication

PropertyDefinition.Name: WSSecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of WS-Security to be used; Combinations of multiple security types can be used with a space in-between. Allowed types are: (UsernameToken, UsernameToken-Digest, SAMLTokenUnsigned, SAMLTokenSigned, Signature, Timestamp, Encrypt)

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptUserName
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt UserName (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The username to be used in the encryption; if blank uses auth username

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnSOAPFault
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Throw connector exception when SOAP fault is returned from source.

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxFileCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of file cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: CryptoPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: User Crypto Property File (If SAML or Signature profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography;defines the certificates;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: SOAPAction
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Value for SOAP-Action header

PropertyDefinition.Name: ProxyUri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the proxy server

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncryptPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encrypt crypto property file (only if Encrypt profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The file defines properties of cryptography for encryption of the message;(crypto.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ExceptionOnIntraQueryCacheExpiration
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Throw an exception when a document expires from the cache between executing different parts of a single query (instead of requesting the document again)

PropertyDefinition.Name: ConnectorCapabilities
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to provide the Connector Capabilities

PropertyDefinition.Name: SAMLPropertyFile
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: SAML Property File (only required when SAML profile used)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: SAML Security property file (saml.properties)

PropertyDefinition.Name: Standard
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Standard Built-in Connector Type

PropertyDefinition.Name: EncodingStyle
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Encoding Style (RPC - Encoded, RPC - Literal, Document - Literal, Document - Encoded)
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Encoding Style

PropertyDefinition.Name: Uri
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The URI of the HTTP source

PropertyDefinition.Name: SecurityType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Type of Authentication to used with the web service; If WS-Secuirty is being used, then WS-Secuirty type must be defined

PropertyDefinition.Name: LogRequestResponseDocs
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Log XML Request and Response Documents
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Write the request and response documents to the log at Info level

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustDeserializerClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to process trusted payloads and execution payloads

PropertyDefinition.Name: InputStreamFilterClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess raw XML input stream

PropertyDefinition.Name: MaxMemoryCacheSize
PropertyDefinition.DisplayName: Max Size of in-memory cache (in kb)

PropertyDefinition.Name: HostnameVerifier
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: a class implmenting javax.net.ssl.HostnameVerifier. Used to implement a hostname mismatch workaround.

PropertyDefinition.Name: TrustType
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: Only required for Signature and Signed SAML; The issuer-serial method presumes that all trusted users of the service are known to the service and have pre-registered their certificate chains before using the service. The direct-reference method presumes that the service operator trusts all users with certificates issued by a trusted CA.

PropertyDefinition.Name: QueryPreprocessorClass
PropertyDefinition.ShortDescription: The class to use to preprocess the IQuery
